summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block J, Bell's 5th Addition, being the alley between 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, from Lenora Street to Blanchard Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 123971 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
